sections.name: page_2
pages: ["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Placing an empty relocator on a machine block will pick up that machine and put it in the relocator.\n\nPlacing a full relocator on the ground will empty the relocator and place the machine there."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.relocators.3"}]}]
